column18: 08/24/2014: Assailants opened fire on the private residence of Kwadwo Marfo in Kumasi city, Ashanti region, Ghana. At least three people, including Marfo, a Kapital Radio journalist, were wounded in the assault. No group claimed responsibility for the attack.
column108: A house was damaged in this attack.
